sentence.Network_en: Two key witnesses at her trial committed perjury.
sentence.Network_cn: 在对她的庭审中有两名主要证人犯了伪证罪.

sentence.Network_en: This witness has committed perjury and no reliance can be placed on her evidence.
sentence.Network_cn: 这名证人作了伪证，她的证词不可信。

sentence.Network_en: You'll be punished if you procure the witness to commit perjury.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果你诱使证人作伪证,你要受罚的.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... perfidy 不忠，背叛 perjury 伪证，假誓 perfunctory 草率的.
伪证罪（Perjury）指在正式宣誓后说谎或者出具证明为不实的陈述，是一种刑事罪行，因为证人宣誓过会说真话，为了确保法庭的公 …
词根辅助记忆GRE单词 - 豆丁网 ... abjure v. 发誓放弃，避免，公开放弃 perjury n. 伪誓，伪证 jury n. 陪审团（法律的人陪审团）.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... perfidy 不忠，背叛 perjury 伪证，假誓 perfunctory 草率的.

1954-Alger Hiss is released from prison after serving 44 months for perjury .1954年，阿尔杰·希斯（中央情报局的间谍)在因伪证服刑44个月后，从监狱中被释放。
subject to prosecution 可被公诉suborn perjury 唆使提供伪证submit evidence 提出证据

the most stinging criticism of congressional efforts to impeach Mr.Clinton is that they are partisan , motivated not by a desire to uphold the sanctity of law in the face of presidential perjury , but by political bloodlust .对于国会力图弹劾克林顿的最尖刻的批评是说他们是在进行党派之争

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Anglo-Norman French perjurie, from Latin perjurium 'false oath', from the verb perjurare (see perjure)

entry.def: If someone who is giving evidence in a court of law commits perjury, they lie.

example.ex: This witness has committed perjury and no reliance can be placed on her evidence.
example.tran: 这名证人作了伪证，她的证词不可信。

means.word_mean: 1. criminal offense of making false statements under oath

auth_sentence.content: Historically, crimes like perjury were treated very seriously.
auth_sentence.res_content: Historically, crimes like perjury were treated very seriously.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Historically, crimes like perjury were treated very seriously.

auth_sentence.content: "Perjury is different from lying," he said.
auth_sentence.res_content: "Perjury is different from lying," he said.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: "Perjury is different from lying," he said.

auth_sentence.content: Society...proffers an oath and with it the opportunity for perjury.
auth_sentence.res_content: Society...proffers an oath and with it the opportunity for perjury.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Society...proffers an oath and with it the opportunity for perjury.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 法律上的,有关权利义务的
stems_affixes.word_buile: jur发誓,法律;正确,正直+al……的→adj.法律上的,有关权利义务的
jur发誓,法律;正确,正直+y人→发誓的人→陪审团
per假+jur发誓+y→假发誓
ab离开+jure=jur发誓,法律;正确,正直→发誓离开→放弃→誓绝
con全部+jure=jur发誓,法律;正确,正直→全部发誓→恳求别人;引申为变魔术
in不+jur发誓,法律;正确,正直+e→不法行为→伤害[别人]

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"贯穿,自始至终;全部"; 2. 表示"假,坏"

per贯穿,自始至终;全部+man拿住+ent……的→永久拿住→永恒的
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+nic毒+ious……的→有毒的
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+plex重叠+ed……的→重叠在一起→困惑的
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+spect看+ive……的→看透了→透视的
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+spic看+acious多……的→全部看到→独具慧眼

per假,坏+funct作用+ory……的→没起好作用→草率的
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+cuss摇动,敲打+ion表名词→一直敲打
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+oxide氧化物→贯穿的氧化物→过氧化物
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+turb搅→直搅乱→扰乱
per假,坏+fid相信+y状态→假相信→不忠诚
per假,坏+jur发誓+y状态→假发誓;参考:jury陪审团
